sentences.en: an agreement made on the basis of mutual trust
sentences.cn: 在相互信任的基础上达成的一项协议

sentences.en: At first there was a lack of trust between them.
sentences.cn: 起初，他们之间缺乏信任。

sentences.en: Eleanor's work among the women will, I trust, bear fruit.
sentences.cn: 我相信埃莉诺所做的工作会在妇女中有所成效。

sentences.en: George is a public relations officer for The John Bennett Trust.
sentences.cn: 乔治是约翰·本尼特信托公司的一名公关主管。

sentences.en: He susses his colleagues out and he knows who he can trust.
sentences.cn: 他摸清了自己同事的底细，知道了谁可以信任。

sentences.en: His working title for the script was "Trust the People".
sentences.cn: 他给这个剧本暂定的标题是《相信人民》。

sentences.en: Hunting on the trust's 625,000 acres was last debated two years ago.
sentences.cn: 有关在该托管机构管理的62.5万英亩土地上狩猎一事，最近一次辩论是两年前。

sentences.en: I am reluctant to trust anyone totally, Your Excellency.
sentences.cn: 我不想完全相信任何人，阁下。

sentences.en: I just don’t trust him.
sentences.cn: 我就是不信任他。

sentences.en: I still can't trust myself to remain composed in their presence.
sentences.cn: 我仍然不放心自己能否在他们面前保持镇静。

sentences.en: I wouldn't trust them in spite of all their la-di-da manners.
sentences.cn: 尽管他们处处显得很高雅的样子，我还是不相信他们。

sentences.en: It can be beneficial to share your feelings with someone you trust.
sentences.cn: 向自己信任的人倾诉感情是很有益处的。

sentences.en: Jake has raised two smashing kids and I trust his judgement.
sentences.cn: 杰克养大了两个了不起的孩子，我相信他的判断。

sentences.en: She took over as chief executive of the Book Trust.
sentences.cn: 她接任书业托拉斯的总裁。

sentences.en: That's why I must trust you to keep this secret.
sentences.cn: 那就是为什么我必须得相信你会保守这个秘密的原因。

sentences.en: The money will be put in trust until she is 18.
sentences.cn: 钱会交付他人托管，直到她年满18岁。

sentences.en: The money your father left you will be held in trust until you are 21.
sentences.cn: 你父亲留给你的钱将被托管到你满21岁。

sentences.en: trust Sam to have all the inside information.
sentences.cn: 萨姆定会设法去了解全部内情的。

sentences.en: We trust that he and his department are considering our suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我们估计他和他的部门正在考虑我们的建议。

sentences.en: Works of art are in trust to us during our lifetime.
sentences.cn: 艺术品交由我们托管一生。

sentences.en: You betrayed your father’s trust (= did something bad even though he trusted you ) .
sentences.cn: 你辜负了你父亲对你的信任。

sentences.en: You betrayed your father’s trust (= did something bad even though he trusted you ).
sentences.cn: 你辜负了你父亲对你的信任。

words.tran_cn: 托管；托管制度；托管人职责；托管领土
移交（财产或管理权）给受托人

phrases.tran_cn: 被托管：被爱托人拥有或照管
n. 国民托管组织（英国保护名胜古迹的私人组织）

phrases.phrase: not trust someone as far as one can throw them

phrases.tran_cn: 不加深究地，不加考察地；不赁证据
某人做某事乃意料中事，某人（会去）做某事乃其天性使然，某人定会去做某事
单位信托公司；投资公司；联合托拉斯

trans.tran_cn: 信任，信托（财产），信托基金机构，公立医院
trans.tran_en: a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 相信，信任，信仰，托付，期望
trans.tran_en: to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

trans.tran_cn: 依靠， 信赖； 相信， 信任
trans.tran_en: to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

trans.tran_cn: 相信，信赖；委托，托付；依靠，依赖
trans.tran_en: to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

trans.tran_cn: 相信， 信任， 信赖
trans.tran_en: a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something
